{ jsx, jsxs } from 'react/jsx-runtime';\nimport Card from '@material-ui/core/Card';\nimport CardContent from '@material-ui/core/CardContent';\nimport CardHeader from '@material-ui/core/CardHeader';\nimport Divider from '@material-ui/core/Divider';\nimport { makeStyles, withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles';\nimport TabUI from '@material-ui/core/Tab';\nimport Tabs from '@material-ui/core/Tabs';\nimport { useState, Children, isValidElement } from 'react';\nimport { BottomLink } from '../BottomLink/BottomLink.esm.js';\nimport { ErrorBoundary } from '../ErrorBoundary/ErrorBoundary.esm.js';\n\nconst useTabsStyles = makeStyles(\n  (theme) => ({\n    root: {\n      padding: theme.spacing(0, 2, 0, 2.5),\n      minHeight: theme.spacing(3)\n    },\n    indicator: {\n      backgroundColor: theme.palette.info.main,\n      height: theme.spacing(0.3)\n    }\n  }),\n  { name: \"BackstageTabbedCard\" }\n);\nconst BoldHeader = withStyles(\n  (theme) => ({\n    root: { padding: theme.spacing(2, 2, 2, 2.5), display: \"inline-block\" },\n    title: { fontWeight: 700 },\n    subheader: { paddingTop: theme.spacing(1) }\n  }),\n  { name: \"BackstageTabbedCardBoldHeader\" }\n)(CardHeader);\nfunction TabbedCard(props) {\n  const {\n    slackChannel,\n    errorBoundaryProps,\n    children,\n    title,\n    deepLink,\n    value,\n    onChange\n  } = props;\n  const tabsClasses = useTabsStyles();\n  const [selectedIndex, selectIndex] = useState(0);\n  const handleChange = onChange ? onChange : (_ev, newSelectedIndex) => selectIndex(newSelectedIndex);\n  let selectedTabContent;\n  if (!value) {\n    Children.map(children, (child, index) => {\n      if (isValidElement(child) && index === selectedIndex) {\n        selectedTabContent = child?.props.children;\n      }\n    });\n  } else {\n    Children.map(children, (child) => {\n      if (isValidElement(child) && child?.props.value === value) {\n        selectedTabContent = child?.props.children;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n  const errProps = errorBoundaryProps || (slackChannel ? { slackChannel } : {});\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(Card, { children: /* @__PURE__ */ jsxs(ErrorBoundary, { ...errProps, children: [\n    title && /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(BoldHeader, { title }),\n    /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(\n      Tabs,\n      {\n        classes: tabsClasses,\n        value: value || selectedIndex,\n        onChange: handleChange,\n        children\n      }\n    ),\n    /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(Divider, {}),\n    /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(CardContent, { children: selectedTabContent }),\n    deepLink && /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(BottomLink, { ...deepLink })\n  ] }) });\n}\nconst useCardTabStyles = makeStyles(\n  (theme) => ({\n    root: {\n      minWidth: theme.spacing(6),\n      minHeight: theme.spacing(3),\n      margin: theme.spacing(0, 2, 0, 0),\n      padding: theme.spacing(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0),\n      textTransform: \"none\",\n      \"&:hover\": {\n        opacity: 1,\n        backgroundColor: \"transparent\",\n        color: theme.palette.text.primary\n      }\n    },\n    selected: {\n      fontWeight: theme.typography.fontWeightBold\n    }\n  }),\n  { name: \"BackstageCardTab\" }\n);\nfunction CardTab(props) {\n  const { children, ...restProps } = props;\n  const classes = useCardTabStyles();\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(TabUI, { disableRipple: true, classes, ...restProps });\n}\n\nexport { CardTab, TabbedCard };\n//# sourceMappingURL=TabbedCard.esm.js.map\n","import { jsx, jsxs } from 'react/jsx-runtime';\nimport { useEntity } from '@backstage/plugin-catalog-react';\nimport Alert from '@material-ui/lab/Alert';\nimport { apiDocsConfigRef } from '../../config.esm.js';\nimport { PlainApiDefinitionWidget } from '../PlainApiDefinitionWidget/PlainApiDefinitionWidget.esm.js';\nimport { TabbedCard, CardTab } from '@backstage/core-components';\nimport { useApi } from '@backstage/core-plugin-api';\n\nconst ApiDefinitionCard = () => {\n  const { entity } = useEntity();\n  const config = useApi(apiDocsConfigRef);\n  const { getApiDefinitionWidget } = config;\n  if (!entity) {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(Alert, { severity: \"error\", children: \"Could not fetch the API\" });\n  }\n  const definitionWidget = getApiDefinitionWidget(entity);\n  const entityTitle = entity.metadata.title ?? entity.metadata.name;\n  if (definitionWidget) {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ jsxs(TabbedCard, { title: entityTitle, children: [\n      /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(CardTab, { label: definitionWidget.title, children: definitionWidget.component(entity.spec.definition) }, \"widget\"),\n      /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(CardTab, { label: \"Raw\", children: /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(\n        PlainApiDefinitionWidget,\n        {\n          definition: entity.spec.definition,\n          language: definitionWidget.rawLanguage || entity.spec.type\n        }\n      ) }, \"raw\")\n    ] });\n  }\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(\n    TabbedCard,\n    {\n      title: entityTitle,\n      children: [\n        // Has to be an array, otherwise typescript doesn't like that this has only a single child\n        /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(CardTab, { label: entity.spec.type, children: /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(\n          PlainApiDefinitionWidget,\n          {\n            definition: entity.spec.definition,\n            language: entity.spec.type\n          }\n        ) }, \"raw\")\n      ]\n    }\n  );\n};\n\nexport { ApiDefinitionCard };\n//# sourceMappingURL=ApiDefinitionCard.esm.js.map\n","import { jsx } from 'react/jsx-runtime';\nimport { CodeSnippet } from '@backstage/core-components';\n\nconst PlainApiDefinitionWidget = (props) => {\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(\n    CodeSnippet,\n    {\n      text: props.definition,\n      language: props.language,\n      showCopyCodeButton: true\n    }\n  );\n};\n\nexport { PlainApiDefinitionWidget };\n//# sourceMappingURL=PlainApiDefinitionWidget.esm.js.map\n","import { jsx } from 'react/jsx-runtime';\nimport Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography';\nimport { apiDocsConfigRef } from '../../config.esm.js';\nimport { useApi } from '@backstage/core-plugin-api';\n\nconst ApiTypeTitle = (props) => {\n  const { apiEntity } = props;\n  const config = useApi(apiDocsConfigRef);\n  const definition = config.getApiDefinitionWidget(apiEntity);\n  const type = definition ? definition.title : apiEntity.spec.type;\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ jsx(Typography, { component: \"span\", variant: \"inherit\", children: type });\n};\n\nexport { ApiTypeTitle };\n//# sourceMappingURL=ApiTypeTitle.esm.js.map\n"],"names":["useTabsStyles","makeStyles","theme","BoldHeader","withStyles","CardHeader","TabbedCard","props","slackChannel","errorBoundaryProps","children","title","deepLink","value","onChange","tabsClasses","selectedIndex","selectIndex","handleChange","_ev","newSelectedIndex","selectedTabContent","child","index","errProps","Card","Tabs","Divider","CardContent","useCardTabStyles","CardTab","restProps","classes","Tab","ApiDefinitionCard","entity","config","getApiDefinitionWidget","Alert","definitionWidget","entityTitle","PlainApiDefinitionWidget","ApiTypeTitle","apiEntity","definition","type"],"sourceRoot":""}
